# Haxe Roundup № 5

Via twitter

Never used jQuery before and want to use it in haXe? Andy Li has written a quick start tutorial to get you going

    • Disktree has released a XMPP/LOP ([linked process protocol][link 4]) library which spawns hscript vms, source at github
